/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/TestVulkan.dir/main.cpp.o  -o TestVulkan   -L/etc/explicit_layer.d  -Wl,-rpath,/etc/explicit_layer.d /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglfw.so.3.3 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libvulkan.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSM.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libICE.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXext.so
